name: Howard the Coder [C64]
description:
CoderX is a 3D platform-based RPG game that has different kinds of Programming languages that users can learn, a platform-based game where players must find their way to finishing a level or room, a programming languages topic quiz-like scenarios that the player needs to answer correctly to clear a level or room. The basic programming language code has a syntax that will guide the user. CoderX can help users improve their skills because this game is more on basic programming languages that even people who have no background in programming can still play the game. The nice thing about this game is that you can enjoy playing while still learning.

It's still in development

please share your feedback.
